data.text: @jmichaeljsanto @jmiguelsanto @ChrisMcTague3 You're right, Michael. A basically good guy who still has a lot to learn. Gets harder as you get older as Justin will discover.
@jmiguelsanto @ChrisMcTague3 @jmichaeljsanto Justin really needs to grow emotionally. Too much too soon, his spoiled childhood has prevented him from dealing with life realistically.
@jmichaeljsanto I honestly never even heard of Haley Baldwin until they were "engaged " I am all for religion but I think it may also have something to do with that. Just a thought though.
@jmiguelsanto His behaviour seems to have a pattern consistent with bi polar. Plus he has always had a thing for Selena.
